pr_title: webmvc-adapter: improve set entry in request to avoid ErrorEntryFreeException

timeline.message: If attribute key already exists in request, don't create entry to avoid ErrorEntryFreeException

timeline.bodyText: Could you please add some comments regarding the related issue?
timeline.author: sczyh30

replies.bodyText: I'll arrange it and add comments after work.
replies.author: cdfive

replies.bodyText: Comments are added, please check it.
replies.author: cdfive
